mapper.insert: insert into product (prodid, prodnm, prodcnt, cateid, prodprice, costprice, discount, exprirydate, regdate, imgpath, delflag) values (#{prodid}, #{prodnm}, #{prodcnt}, #{cateid}, #{prodprice}, #{costprice}, #{discount}, #{expirydate}, #{regdate}, #{imgpath}, #{delflag})
